About Me

I am passionate about exploring and learning new 'stuff'. Maybe it is not just with me; all humans have curiosity. A famous quote by Leonardo da Vinci (because why not): “To develop a complete mind: Study the science of art; Study the art of science. Learn how to see. Realize that everything connects to everything else.” I have a lots of pieces of wisdom to share but if I continue, you will call me a hypocrite. I am an undergradute at IIT Bombay pursuing a major in Aerospace Engineering. Not planning to make an Iron-Man suit anytime soon but stay updated, I might end up building something more fascinating.

Projects

Autonomous Underwater Vehicle

AUV-IITB is a multidisciplinary team of 52 members focused on developing autonomous underwater vehicles from the perspective to handle real-time tasks. The vehicle is capable of way-point navigation, object detection, robotic actuation, acoustic communication etc. underwater. The team has 4 subdivisions, namely: software, electrical, mechanical and business.

Website
SolidWorks Ansys Mechanincal Simulink Ansys Fluent Matlab

Solar Radiation Prediction

The project aims to test the implementation of a model which predicts Irradiation falling on the ground for different prediction horizons using an SVM (Support Vector Machine) and its comparison with the Neural Networks. The multilayer perceptron architecture in NN has three layers with ReLU activation, and RBF kernel used in SVM classification manifested MAPE of 20%.

Website
Python Tensorflow scikit-learn Keras

Big Data Analysis

Inspected and evaluated data using analytical and statistical tools on most popular movies (source IMDb) to discover useful information, predict movie ratings and aid in business decision making. Applied linear regression on consonant parameters in the refined data-set using the stats module library.

Python Pandas SciPy

Phoenix Shooter (Game)

A 2D game developed as a hobby project wich includes designing the enemy & player battleships, background effects, music additions and creating powerups.

Website
Python Pygame
